CustomField.description: Start Date of Opportunity. Displayed on Opp Page View as Confirmed Shoot Date. Flows into SF Shoot Date Calendar + issues warnings when entering in conflicting opp dates on opp creation
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Start Date of Opportunity. Displayed on Opp Page View as Confirmed Shoot Date. Flows into SF Shoot Date Calendar + issues warnings when entering in conflicting opp dates on opp creation
CustomField.label: Shoot Date - Start
